OMEAttribute.Description: The name of this project.
Refers to the experimenter doing the project.
Refers to the group doing the project.
The name of this dataset.
Whether or not this experiment is locked.
Refers to the experimenter associated with this dataset
Refers to the group associated with this dataset.
The name of this image.
The date when this image was created.
Refers to the experimenter associated with this image.
Refers to the pixels that are in this image.
The name of this LogicalChannel.
Refers to the lightsource used for this LogicalChannel.
Refers to the OTF thingy associated with this LogicalChannel.
Refers to the detector used to create this LogicalChannel.
Refers to the filter used in this LogicalChannel.
The x coordinate size of these pixels.
The y coordinate size of these pixels.
The z coordinate size of these pixels.
The c coordinate size of these pixels.
The t coordinate size of these pixels.
Describes the type of pixels used.
The type of experiment this was.
A brief description of the experiment.
Refers to the experimenter associated with this experiment.

OMEElement.Description: Information about the person who did the experiment.

OMEAttribute.Description: The experimenter's first name.
The experimenter's last name.
The experimenter's email.
The institution the experimenter belongs to.
Refers to the group associated with this experimenter.
The manufacturer of this instrument.
The model information about this instrument.
The serialnumber of this instrument.
The type of instrument this was.

OMEElement.Description: Info relating to the experiment's objective.
